title: Epices et Tout
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health-oriented restaurant. A large part of the ingredients are organic or local. Many dishes are vegetarian and a few are vegan: salads, soups, sandwiches, rice and lentils. Possible to replace meat or egg with tofu. Option to customize your sandwich or salad. Has fresh juices and smoothies.
